text:
Turlock, California is a city in Stanislaus County in California. In 2016, the city had a population of 72,796 people. It is the second-largest city in Stanislaus County.
California State University, Stanislaus is located in Turlock.
Geography.
Turlock is located between Modesto and Merced. Turlock is situated in the Central Valley.
Turlock has a semi-arid climate.
